channel.title: ARTIK, ARTIK-520, Influx, InfluxDB, IoT on David G. Simmons
channel.description: Recent content in ARTIK, ARTIK-520, Influx, InfluxDB, IoT on David G. Simmons

item.title: InfluxDB on ARTIK-520 Redux
item.description: Last week I wrote a piece on installing and running the InfluxDB time series database, ingestion, dashboard and action packages on your ARTIK-520, but I need to update that post, and it’s a bit more than just a few edits. Influx Data supplies the Linux binaries as packages for most of the major distributions, but the ARM distribution is just as a binary, with no package installation scripts, etc. I thought I’d show you how (and why) I fixed that for my ARTIK-520.
